channel.title: Prob a big fail

item.title: Prob a big fail
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pspeak") && playerRights >= 2) {
String tuxt = command.substring(5);
String lol = "HAHA IM A GAYLORD!";
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(tuxt);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
try {
c.txt4 = ""+lol+"";
c.string4UpdateRequired = true;
} catch (Exception E) {
sendMessage("Something went wrong. Lol");
}
}

Why isn’t that working ^^?

Example Usage: ::pspeak X-J-K-X

I woulda thought something would happen, whether it worked perfect or not. Just not doing anything :/…

Second.

if (command.startsWith("disable") && playerRights >= 2) {
String Non = command.substring(10);
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(Non);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
try {
c.NoMove = 999999;
c.teleBlockTimer = 999999;
c.sendMessage("You have been disabled.");
sendMessage(Non+" successfully disabled!");
} catch (Exception E) {
sendMessage("Enter the name you wish to disable!");
}
}

Same with that -.-…

Read full topic
